pergola.title: Bioclimatic Pergola
pergola.subtitle: The ultimate solution for your terrace
pergola.description: Our bioclimatic pergolas combine functionality with elegance. The adjustable aluminium louvres give you complete control over sunlight and ventilation.

benefits.title: Benefits
items: Enjoy your terrace all year round
Perfect protection against sun and rain
Increases the value of your property

items.question: What is the price of a bioclimatic pergola in Belgium?
items.answer: The price of a bioclimatic pergola ranges between €400 and €950 per m² depending on dimensions, options (LED, motorisation, screens) and finishes. For a standard pergola of 15-20m², expect between €8,000 and €15,000 including installation. Request a free quote for an exact price tailored to your project.

items.question: Do I need a building permit for a pergola in Belgium?
items.answer: Generally, a pergola smaller than 40m² does not require a permit in Belgium, but a prior declaration may be required depending on your municipality. We advise you to check with your local administration. We can guide you through these steps.

items.question: How do adjustable louvres work?
items.answer: The adjustable louvres can rotate from 0° to 135° thanks to an electric motor controlled by remote or smartphone. In the closed position, they protect against rain. When open, they let light and air through. A rain sensor can automatically close the louvres.

items.question: What is the lifespan of an aluminium pergola?
items.answer: A powder-coated aluminium pergola has a lifespan of at least 25 to 40 years. Aluminium does not rust, does not warp and is UV resistant. Maintenance is limited to occasional cleaning with soapy water.

items.question: Can a pergola be installed on an existing terrace?
items.answer: Yes, our pergolas can be installed on any type of surface: tiled terrace, wood, concrete or directly on pedestals. We adapt the fixings to your situation. A free technical visit allows us to evaluate the best solutions.

veranda.title: Aluminium Veranda
veranda.subtitle: Extend your living space
veranda.description: A veranda is the perfect extension of your home. Our aluminium verandas offer excellent insulation and timeless design.

benefits.title: Benefits
items: Extra living space all year round

items.question: What is the price of an aluminium veranda in Belgium?
items.answer: The price of an aluminium veranda ranges between €1,200 and €2,500 per m². For a 15m² veranda, expect between €18,000 and €35,000 depending on options (glazing, roof, finishes). The price usually includes design, manufacturing and installation. Request a free personalised quote.

items.question: Do I need a permit to build a veranda in Belgium?
items.answer: Yes, in Belgium, a planning permit is generally required for a veranda as it changes the external appearance of your home. Rules vary by region (Wallonia, Flanders, Brussels). We guide you through all administrative steps.

items.question: What is the difference between a veranda and a pergola?
items.answer: A veranda is a closed extension of the house, fully glazed and insulated, usable all year round as living space. A pergola is an open or semi-open structure, ideal for enjoying the outdoors with sun protection. Both can be combined.

items.question: How do I heat a veranda in winter?
items.answer: Thanks to thermally broken profiles and double/triple glazing, our verandas retain heat well. Several heating options are possible: central heating extension, heat pump, electric radiators or underfloor heating. We advise the best solution.

items.question: How long does it take to build a veranda?
items.answer: After project approval and obtaining the permit, allow 6 to 10 weeks for manufacturing and 1 to 2 weeks for installation depending on complexity. We plan the work to minimise disruption and ensure impeccable finishing.

carport.title: Aluminium Carport
carport.subtitle: Protection with style
carport.description: Protect your vehicles with a durable and stylish aluminium carport. Fully custom made for your situation.

items.question: What is the price of an aluminium carport in Belgium?
items.answer: The price of an aluminium carport ranges between €3,500 and €8,000 for a single car model, and between €6,000 and €15,000 for a double carport. The price depends on dimensions, roof type and options (LED lighting, side walls). Request a free quote.

items.question: Do I need a permit for a carport in Belgium?
items.answer: Generally, an open carport smaller than 40m² does not require a planning permit, but a declaration may be required. Rules vary by municipality and region. We check the applicable regulations for your situation before any project.

items.question: Carport or garage: which to choose?
items.answer: A carport is less expensive, quicker to install and often does not require a permit. It offers effective protection against rain, sun and frost. A garage offers more security and storage but costs 3 to 4 times more. A carport with walls can be a good compromise.

items.question: Can solar panels be installed on a carport?
items.answer: Yes, our carports are designed to support photovoltaic panels. It's an excellent solution to produce electricity while protecting your vehicle. We work with partners for solar installation.
